overview:
Currently Cofounder and director at FactoryAR, which was selected and invested by NXTPLabs on Jun 2012.

The main focus at FactoryAR is to create games to stimulate different cognitive areas of the peopleâ€™s brain in a really fun and social way.

His profile combines in equal proportions the artistic and technical fields, so he is in equilibrium between these two worlds.

Responsible, flexible and willing to learn about internet technologies.

He is a Software Engineering Student (5 subjects left).

He was co-founder in 2006 of Masmind, web development agency, where he led development teams to carry out the projects for five years (through 2011).
